modName: Hunting Bow and Long Bow Craftable
summary: Makes the Long Bow and Hunting Bow craftable
descriptionHtml:
Description: I made this mod for myself because I had multiple crafting/upgrading enabler mods for the vanilla weapons and armors, yet none of them included the hunting or long bow.  I didn\'t want to download another total crafting overhaul because it would clutter my crafting screen with things that I already have recipes for, so i made this. This may be useful to you if you find yourself in my situation.

Side notes: Yes I know this is mind numbingly simple and yes I know it has already been done in other mods, I\'m just making a small version to fit in with larger mods.  If I find anything else that slipped through the cracks of my other crafting mods, I might upload a recipe for it.

Installation: Put the .esp in your data folder, wasn\'t that hard.

Permission: Honestly, you can do whatever you want with this.  If you use this, some credit would be nice but this is such a simple mod that I really don\'t expect it.  If you want to give someone credit,a shout out to Bethesda in your readme or description would be nice.

Credits: Bethesda for Skyrim
Any modders who make crafting mods for all of the lovely things you do
author: RaisTheWolf
